title: NO support
body: Where i can get it, the web page does not provide it and in the forum they almost never answered

replies.body: What's going on? Porocles and I are here to help where we can. ^.^

I don't know of a way to specifically filter out my posts. I can see how my influx of posts could cause you trouble, and I'm sorry about that, friend. :/

I don't work on the Boards development team, though, you may want to post this idea to our [**Boards Feedback**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/site-feedback), that way a member of the development team may see this.

Okay, I did just that. I'd be awesome if you could use your power of red for good and throw me a comment on the [suggestion post here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/site-feedback/3JZXX0QG-please-implment-a-red-tracker-filter) to get it some traction and hopefully let a relevant rioter see <3
A viable suggestion or a viable option? If there is already a way to toggle off help and support posts can you tell me how?
Seconding this question, for the same reasons.
i had 80% rate of afk teams in 10 matchs, how this is normal??? and without remake, why the remake not work if they are online 1 min????

Wow, that doesn't seem right at all. I looked through your match history and was unable to see a wild trend of AFK's, so more information would be needed to look into this. As for a remake, one will only become available after a player has been marked as *inactive* for **90 seconds or more** within the first 3 minutes of the match. Check out our [**Remake FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ) for more info on how that works.

If you have any further information on this or have any other questions about this incident, I recommend reaching out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can get you in touch with one of our game specialists.
